text: Can these two parameters be left unchanged? What impact will it have on the node if they are not changed?

elements.text: Can these two parameters be left unchanged? What impact will it have on the node if they are not changed?

text: As far as I remember there are no default values. Values don't matter as long as they are different for different targets. This is to reduce the scope of how a particular authentication token could be used. For example, if validator is configured to accept tokens with audience "validator" then it won't accept a token with audience "myapp" and vice-versa.

elements.text: As far as I remember there are no default values. Values don't matter as long as they are different for different targets. This is to reduce the scope of how a particular authentication token could be used. For example, if validator is configured to accept tokens with audience "validator" then it won't accept a token with audience "myapp" and vice-versa.
